NumPy Functions¶

rsokl_dummy.numpy_functions.pairwise_dists(x, y)[source]¶

Computing pairwise distances using memory-efficient vectorization.

Parameters
xnumpy.ndarray, shape=(M, D)
ynumpy.ndarray, shape=(N, D)
Returns
numpy.ndarray, shape=(M, N)

The Euclidean distance between each pair of rows between x and y.
